question: What is the name of the new organism discovered by team of scientists at National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA)?
explanation: A team of scientists at National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA) has named a new organism discovered by them after A.P.J. Abdul Kalam, a Former President of India. The name of the bacterium is Solibacillus kalamii. the species name is named after Abdul Kalam and genus name is Solibacillus.
